content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on a clear night at about 8pm.  it had just gotten dark.  i was headed toward a "t" intersection and on the far side of the intersection, on the lot of an unoccupied and unlit home, i noticed a vivid red circle.  this circle appeared perfectly round with zero distortion on the edges and uniformly lit or colored.  i did not perceive it as a ball.  the distance was in the area of 125 yards or so.  the red circle appeared to be 6 ft off the ground and stationary.  i kept my eyes on the as i walked in that direction, thinking it was some sort of light.  i felt curious, nothing more.  it seemed as if my viewing angle changed slightly as i thought a branch from a tree on the property was in front of the object.  the object appeared to get fuzzy and fade within a second.  there were some teens walking on the other side of the street i was on, in the opposite direction with their backs to the circle.  i looked at them to see if they noticed it but there was no indication of that.  i walked to the intersection and looked at the property from about 30 yards and there were cars, lights, people or anything.  there were no cars driving on either street and no traffic lights are anywhere near the area.  i returned to the location/distance i observed the circle from about 4 minutes later, thinking it was an ocular trick on my eyes, but could do nothing to repeat the event.
content.summary: Clear well defined red circle 6ft. off ground.  est. distance of 125 yards.  est. diameter of 4ft.  10 second duration then faded rapidly.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to my paio for a smoke and above the building north of me was a very large object.  it was a cloudless early evening, not even twilight yet.  not a cloud anywhere....And off to the north was this very, very white object with a shape to it.  it was almost a box at one end and a tappering of the rest of it.  it never moved in any direction for the 10 to 15 minutes that it was there.  it also had a shimmering effect to it.

at one point a commercial jet passed in front of it and seemed to veer away from its normal flight path.  almost evasive in nature, while the object never moved.

i was in the military for six years....This was no weather ballon.  i also never heard a sound from it (like a helicopter).

my first thoughts were of great interest.  there where no clouds in the sky.  if you ever look at venus and how bright that can be.....Times that brightness by 5 but whiter than anything i've ever encoutered.

finally, the object moved a bout 20 yards to my right (east) and vanished.

i'm wondering if you've had any other reports from people in the phoenix metro area.

thank you for your time.

yours,
jon marini

p.S.  i'm sorry but i don't know how to send drawing and or pictures on my computer yet.  but if you wish, i'd be happy to mail you a drawing of it.

p.S.S.  i'm very sane
content.summary: Walked on my patio and there it was

content.detailedDescription: I was filming the sunset and did not see the ufo until reviewing the video 3 days later. was excited in what i saw. seems to be flying around the sun then zips off down at a right angle then returns.
content.summary: Small spot flying erattically

content.detailedDescription: You have no comprehension of the magnitude... with which these phantoms of our atmosphere exist. they are untouchable!
content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: They have always been here!

content.detailedDescription:
Im not sure if one of your field agents is already working on this but it is worth checking into as their are multiple witnesses and good video of 2 ufo's in the night sky for about 2 hours on august 12th.  here are links to the youtube video and the news clip that ran on the local news channel.
http://www.Kxly.Com/global/story.Asp?S=10928220
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=eikabatyjb8
content.summary: Multiple witness sighting of 2 ufos, one white and one green.

content.detailedDescription: I was siting down outside on my backyard deck looking at the stars with my binoculars for a while just doing my usual astronomy thing and wanted to give my eyes a break and have a sip of my water. when all of a sudden i felt compelled to look up.I saw a really bright large orb or something flying across the sky,i tracked it with my binoculars and could completely tell that it was no air craft that i know of.There was no sound of an engine nothing at all,and there was no aircraft in the sky at the time.It was also being followed by a star like object,it was kind of funny because it reminded me of close encounters the movie,the orb i saw was at least 1000 to 2000 feet in altitude and i would say about 35 to 50 feet in diameter traveling maybe 80 to 100 km/h.I was facing north and the objects were traveling from the west to the east over top of me.I will never forget this encounter ever!!!,it was the most crazy thing i have ever seen.
content.summary: Super bright orb followed by a small star like object.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside work for a break around 2:40 pm & just looked up & happened too see the objects which were hard to see at first but my eyes adjusted quickly. the sky was perfectly clear. i only saw one at first & thought it was a mylar balloon but it was stationary for about 2-4 minutes & i thought it was very odd. not sure what altitude it was at. then suddenly at it's 4 o'clock position a short distance away another identical object appeared out of nowhere. this object was the same size & brightness. the second object then moved towards the original object in a counter-clockwise spiral-like direction until it reached the area around the original objects 12 0'clock position & it disappeared completely. at that point the original object began moving slowly in a straight line in a west-northwest direction. i watched until it was blocked out by the building & it was moving into brighter sunlight. the whole sighting was about 6-8 minutes. afterwards i thought it was very strange but certainly there would be a rational explanation. i don't believe in ufos in the sense that they are alien craft.
content.summary: Star-like objects moving slowly west - northwest

content.detailedDescription: so last night i was outside talking on my phone and laying on the trunk of my car looking straight up at the sky. its partly cloudy but you can still see stars, especially overhead. suddenly something caught my eye moving from behind a cloud that was in the northern part of the sky. i turned to focus on the object and for the first few seconds i couldn't make out what it was, only that it was an object traveling from north to south, when it got directly over head i could see that it was a huge black triangle, except that the back part of the triangle was concaved toward the front point. all black except for the dim light that it produced from the center front middle of the under belly. the dim light was what had originally caught my eye when i first noticed the object, it was completely silent as it glided overhead. i watched it for a few more seconds until i lost sight of it in cloud cover as the craft travelled south in a straight line same altitude. i'm not sure how high it was, only that it was flying a lot higher than say a cesna airplane but not as high as a commercial airliner. i'm not sure how fast it was traveling, only that it took about to 6-8 seconds to fly over from one side of the sky to the other, but that is including the clouds that were on the horizons. it was about the size of what a half dollar would look like if it were in your hand with your arm fully extended toward the sky. it was big, it was fast, it was silent and it was an awesome experience!!!
content.summary: Black triangular shaped craft flys overhead

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the publix grocery store (near 434 and maitland blvd) and as i was leaving in my car, i stopped at a stop sign and saw an triangular object flying towards maitland summit blvd just over the tall building under construction there. first thing i noticed was the two white lights in the back of the object and one white light (which looked to be in the middle of the two lights in the back but in the front of the object). it was nighttime and i couldn't make out any form between those lights, so i came to the conclusion that it was triangular from the configuration of the lights alone. it also had a red blinking light right smack dab in the middle of the two lights in the back. it seemed to blink on cue, same interval each time (every two seconds or so).

shortly after viewing the object, the front light shut off and i didn't see it come back on the rest of the time i viewed the object. it didn't pass in front of any clouds when the light went out so nothing was obstructing my view of the light. it was moving away very slowly, and at this point, i shut my music off and rolled down the window and couldn't hear any sound coming from it. it seemed to be close enough that i would have heard something.

i lost a visual of the object when i had to pull up to an intersection with my car facing in the opposite direction the object was traveling in. i live less than a mile away in the direction the object was moving and i couldn't see it on my way home. while driving home, i called my wife to see if she could see it and she couldn't. she had brought our dogs outside to use the bathroom while looking in the sky and we noticed that all the dogs in the neighborhood seemed stressed out and they were very noisy. my own dogs were very upset and stressed when they came outside too. i don't know if it was related at all, but it sure seemed quite strange.

it's possible that this was a plane i guess, but it was flying slow enough and looked strange enough for me to want to report it at least.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object with three lights, front light shut off, moving slow

content.detailedDescription: "swords: life on the line" episode 'making waves' (discovery channel).  at the approx 40 min mark, there is a shot of the ocean, and in the background a light is moving slowly, and then picking up speed and disappearing.  date and location are unknown to me, however i believe that they were off the grand banks, east of main.  middle of the ocean essentially.
content.summary: "swords: life on the line" episode 'making waves' - 40 min mark

content.detailedDescription: We were camping saturday, sept. 12th at lake huron campground, which is situated on the west side of m-25 on the shore of lake huron.  it was  about 9:25 p.M., it was dark already, but no clouds - it was very clear and you could see all the stars in the sky.  our firepit had burned down and we were in the process of going back inside our camper.  when we got up from our chairs and turned around to the north to move our chairs next to our camper we both noticed four red/pink lights that were very bright in the sky to the north.  the four lights were in a perfect geometic form (similiar to a cross) and did not blink or loose their form from the time we saw them until they moved south and then disappeared.  they seemed to move in a southerly direction toward us - in perfect formation then suddenly the two center lights (parallel to the ground) dimmed and disappeared as if someone hand turned them off with a dimmer switch.  then the top and bottom lights which were perfectly perpendicular to each other and to the ground went out at the same time.  we thought that the lights may have been flares at first, but there were no planes in the area that the lights were located.  from where they were located, a plane would have had to be relatively low to drop them and we heard nothing.  in addition, the lights did not vary from their exact formation, nor did they flicker.  if they were flares, it would seem that the breeze from the lake would have caused some shift in formation, or cause them to flicker, but they didn't do either.  then, after the red lights went out, we noticed what appeared to be a dark shadowy object moving from west to east across the sky - starting in the area where the red lights had been.  it was traveling faster than any jet we've ever seen.  as it moved east, it got lower and when it appeared over lake huron you could see the dark shadowy object above the tree line to the east of us (where lake huron is located) and the object appeared to be the width of several tree tops.  when it reached the tree tops you couldn't determine how far away it was, or how large it was, only that the general width of what we saw was an object that was approximately equivalent to three tree tops - which seemed pretty large.  also when it was above the trees and continuing to move down toward the water, there appeared to be flickers of white light directly underneath the object.  similiar to what one would see as a reflection of light that was shimmering off moving water - it kind of sparkled under the object for the split second that we saw it. the object did not have any lights on it - it was simply a dark, fast moving shadow that went across the sky from west to east.  it was darker than the starlit night sky and the speed at which it moved was what caught our attention. it appeared as if someone took black camo fabric and covered whatever it was so it would blend in with the dark sky.  it made absolutely no noise.  we don't know what it was, but it appeared to have vanished either onto or into lake huron.  my husband and i both have master's degrees; we're intelligent, reputable individuals. we'd be interested in hearing if anyone else saw anything weird like this.
content.summary: Dark object moving across sky - appearing to go on or into lake huron

content.detailedDescription: We were camping saturday, sept. 12th at lake huron campground, which is situated on the west side of m-25 on the shore of lake huron.  it was  about 9:25 p.M., it was dark already, but no clouds - content.detailedDescription: Was outside taking pictures of the clouds and saw this after reviewing my pictures and was advised to send it to you folks...
content.summary: Just taking pictures of the clouds

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I wonder if any one reported any of these acurances ?I look up all the time hoping to get a glimps at a ufo and saw the first one of those coming home from granger indiana the usual red sircle whith tree green dots hovering over my car went over to the side of the road seamed to dance up and down for alittle while landed for a few minuts and took back off i on the other hand freaked out and left the area this happend in 2001 on fefurary 28 i think and there manny reports of it on the net thats not what i wanted to talk about though ,  this  hapend over a three nihgt period i was in front of my house in the road at  farviev dr in south bend  looking up as usual , the first night i believed i was looking at aroral display, what appered in the sky where waves that appered to be moving from north to south filling the entire visable sky and there was sound that sounded like waves hitting the beach the second night was very deferent the designs became intracate the best way i can explane it is callidascope stars and geometrick forms changing verry rapidly no sound,the third night it became what appered to be roman figures like the ones that apear on 1920s and 30 silver dollars all of these looked to be in a blue haze and filled the entire sky i would not belive myself to be the only one to see this as they  filled the entire sky unless i happened to be the only person to be looking up at three oclock in the morning. by the way the first night i got my friend to go out and look at it and he will not talk about it .This happened in 2004 just befor the tsunami in indonisa please tell me if any one reported anything like this p.S. i did think i was going nuts ,now i am just cureous and i can draw most of what i saw those nights thanks for your time and open mindedness
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.shape: Cross,   Diamond,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Arora type lights in intrecate forms roman statues , calidescope,

content.detailedDescription: At 10:40 pm, tuesday september 15, 2009, my neighbor knocked on my door to inform me that there was something strange on the face of the mountain behind us (wilson mountain, sedona).  while i was getting dressed, i happened to look out my apartment window that faces the mountain, and i noticed this extremely bright rectangular (column) of light, perfectly rectangular in shape on the face of the mountain.  when i arrived next door and made my way to the deck facing the mountain, there were now two columns, identical in shape on the face of the mountain, one slightly up and behind the other column. we estimated that, from the distance we were (approx. 1/2 mile), these must have been approximately 15 feet in width, and about 40 feet tall.   they both were separated in 4 segments, equal in size, (as if you were to stack four smaller rectangles equal in shape on top of each other), and within minutes there seemed to be these "orange" spheres of light blinking and appearing in the area around these columns.  as i, my neighbor and her 21 year old son stood on the deck, i proceeded to set up my telescope to get a better look. this was all taking place in the dark, on a perfectly clear starlit night.  while setting up the telescope, my neighbor was watching them with binoculars.  she commented that these almost looked like large "windows" or doorways in the side of the mountain, which after looking through the binoculars, i agreed.  as we were watching, the column behind the first suddenly became extremely bright.  after setting up the telescope and trying to angle it in the direction of these lights, the brightest column suddenly dimmed, and remained visible for about 20 minutes... then totally disappeared.  the first column remained, but dimmed as well.  i was unable to focus the telescope, and so i asked my neighbor to see if she might be successful.  she was able to angle the scope, which showed what appeared to be something that resembled a "shuttered" rectangular window.  all three of us witnessed this, and initially argued whether this was a house ( which we knew no house existed at that level or height on the mountain.. but agreed that we would keep an open mind until daylight.  note: we left the telescope angled at this sight, and looking out the deck in the morning it was clear that there was no houses or buildings where these 'lights' or doorways/windows appeared.  ) after viewing this "shuttered" formation for about 10 minutes, it too disappeared.  for the next 30 minutes, there was nothing more on the face of the mountain.  i have seen orbs, orange lights, and the like moving about the formations here.. but i've never witnessed such a thing as this, as large or tall, and perfectly shaped.  i believe without a doubt that there are 'bases' of some sort or portals that exist here in sedona among the formations.
content.summary: 2 rectangular bright light columns on face of submarine rock, sedona.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in the woods near my house during the month of april at approximately 2 in the morning.  there are many trails for people to travel along and i walked into a clearing.  the clearing is just down a path from the ansonia nature center in ansonia, ct.  i was simply meandering through the clearing aimlessly gazing around when i noticed an object towering above some trees.  the part of the object i saw was conical or the pointy end of an egg.  there appeared to be geometrical shaped paneling that was gray and a black panel, maybe a window or viewing bay roughly at the center of the side of craft.  the object was stationary and apparently was on the ground roughly 100 yds away.  i only saw the top half of the craft as there were trees blocking the lower portion.  at first i didn't think much of the sighting at all and continued to meander around a bit more as if the object had always been there or was nothing of significance.  after a double-take i walked back to a spot where i could see the craft and found myself in rather a state of disbelief, mystified, scared, in awe, shocked, and a eerie sort of sinister feeling came over me that the object wasn't from earth and just didn't quite belong here.  i continued to move around a bit and strangely found myself stopping and putting my nose up against an errant plant limb.  i stood there with my nose touching the limb for roughly two minutes as if i was frozen or unable to move and as i was doing so something very lightly and gently began to rub up against my nose as if trying to comfort me or something. after this occurrence, i began to move again and decided to get away from the area and walked back home rather quickly and scared.
content.summary: Conical/egg shaped craft landed in woods near nature center/pond

content.detailedDescription: Standing in back yard observing western night sky. conditions were clear, unlimited visibility, no clouds in the sky. temperature 69 deg. wind o, humidity 96 percent. observed star low to the west about 10 degrees above the horizon. the star seemed to be changing from silver light to red light. i went in the house and brought back my binoculars which are military surplus, unknown magnification. i laid the binoculars on top of my pickup bed and was able to see the object in a steady state. the light was also appearing to change colors through the binoculars and was a great distance away. size was slightly smaller than venus.I went back in the house and looked up the current position of mars, thinking that was what i had seen. learning that mars is not in the west, and not visible at that time of evening, i went back outside. the object had disappeared. i continued to observe the western sky quadrant i am able to see, (light pollution, trees, and buildings are present). after about 15-20 minutes i saw what looked like a rapidly moving small cloud approaching from the north at 3 o clock position. when the cloud was directly above my position it reminded me of a moving searchlight illuminating the bottom of a cloud layer. as the object/cloud moved on to the south i was able to see more details. the object/cloud was very dim, no lights at all and no sound. elevation to the object/cloud was approximately 5000 feet, boomerang shape and wing span was about 400 feet. wing width was 50-80 feet. there was some taper of the wings from center to tip, the center was probably about 1/3 greater than the tip width. there appeared to be several alternating bands of grey cloudy to dark sky bands that were ahead of the wings starting about halfway out on the leading edge of the wings, curving around the tips, and extending back past the trailing wing tip edges.  this gave the impression that the wing tips were extended backwards for quite a distance, but i think that was an illusion due to the bands of cloud flowing around the wing tips. the object/cloud was obscured by a tree as it continued to move and i did not see any further details. i continued to watch the sky thinking that i might see something else, and also thinking that if what i saw was indeed a searchlight illuminating a thin cloud that i would see it again. this did not happen. if this was a searchlight (such as an airport beacon), the airport would have to be due south of my location. to my knowledge there is no airport in that direction. duration of this sighting as described above was approximately 30 seconds. the object/cloud moved in a straight line, no variation in course and no apparent change in altitude. i have a sketch done with autocad in an attempt to demonstrate the alternating bands of cloud seen flowing around the wing tips on this object, i am unable to attach the document to this report.
content.summary: Red to silver star low in western sky followed by flyover of dim object

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my morning run when i noticed a strange looking cloud not far from the sun, rapidly breaking and changing shape. it was odd because it wasn't a windy day and other clouds in the vicinity were much bigger and stationary. then i noticed a metallic sphere appear in the middle of the cloud pulsating with bright white light. it wasn���t moving, just hovering there, silently. it looked like it was changing shape but the flashes were so bright that it was hard to see the exact form. seconds later it was gone and the small cloud surrounding it also disappeared. the object disappeared so suddenly as if a switch turned off and it became invisible instantly. 

a few minutes later as i���m running along my route a saw an object again in another location, this time without the bright flashes and the strange cloud. it was a round metallic orb. i was trying to find a better vintage point to see it unobstructed by trees but it was gone by the time i could get a better view.

the location of the sighting is around st. george street and bernard ave. in toronto, canada.
content.summary: Metallic sphere surrounded by unusual cloud emitting bright white flashes

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my porch having my morn coffee. a huge triangle flew right over my head. it was not a air ship, b-1 or 2, fa-111. this thing made manuvers that is impossible for the human body to take with or without a pressure suit. it made a 235 degree turn so fast my eyes could barely keep up with it. then stopped and went over slowly at the with of half the space of two telephone poles at maybe 500 ft above. no indication of any type of pulposion at all. never seen anything like it ever. i really hope its ours because it was bad ass for sure.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Huge triangle totaly silent right above my head

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in the hot tub watching the sky as i do most nights, i witnessed the most novel sight: a slightly blue, transparent 'swallow' moving across the stars.  it covered about 80 degrees of a sky in less than 5 seconds, and was large beyond measuring (see graphic for relation to star field).  it moved from west to east. as it crossed, i looked away for a split second, returning to see it still there.  it was faint, easier to see out of the corner of your eye than trying to focus on it.  it was very distinct in shape, and i immediately recognized it as a recent crop circle (which moved my brain in a different direction).

it was not a movie premiere light, nor plane (moving too fast).  it did not arc or bend; moved straight off towards horizon and faded in a blink.

being my second 'official' ufo (after giving it a moment of serious thought and continued observation), i felt relieved, as if the human charade had taken a break, and i glimpsed beyond.
content.summary: Looked like the swallow crop circle flying across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a field investigator for mufon. without going into long history, i've had a few encounters which has led me to into research and then into investigations. 
please note the person in the following electrical event i'm submitting below is the same house i witnessed and the other investigator witnessed and photographed  please see case no. 5311 and 5318.
electrical happenings....
6 witnesses in total.
on sat sept 20, 2008 a field investigator friend of mine had been trying to get a hold of me on both my house and cell. she had her daughter text my daughter that it urgent i contact her, which i did right away. she was obviously stirred up by the tone in her voice and told me that there were a couple flashes of light out her windows and a few seconds later the electic in her house was going crazy. 
right away i drove to her home where i witnessed flickering and zapping going on with her front porch lights. she had her kids and their friends outside as i met her in the driveway. from there we went in the house and down into the basement to the circuit breaker box. it was a bit unsetteling because of the lights and i could hear buzzing, zapping, snapping...Like the sound downed power lines make when touching. i honestly thought she was having shorts in her wiring as i'm following her through the room to the circuit box. 
now at the box, i could hear the same zapping and buzzing coming from the wall all around it. she didn���t want to open the box, so i did. there was nothing, no sparks, no fire, no burnt smell, nothing. it all looked normal. she had said earlier she called the power emergency line and they didn���t answer so then she called 911 and then 911 called her back as we were standing there in the basement and told her that they had other numbers for the power co. and finally got a hold of someone and were sending them out. 
the light flickering and buzzing/snapping continued as we walked around her basement. a few moments later when i was standing by her back door in the other room of the basement i seen a flash of bright light from outside her door window. i then stepped outside and we stood for a little bit looking around trying to determine where the flash of light came from. 
at around 10:30 pm the guy from the power co. shows up and the electrical activity had already died down. he checked her basement, the entire house, the garage, all outside her home, the poles, everything...He even put a monitor on her circuit breaker. he was at her house for close to 3 hours checking everything, including the poles and wires up and down the road she lives on. i stayed with her for a little bit longer after he left and then i left myself. i think i got home around 1:30am. after i was home for a bit she texted me again saying that its starting again. 
the power guy found nothing wrong with anything inside or outside her home. he was very professional and did a very through job on checking everything. he found nothing, yet with what i was seeing and hearing his findings didn't make sense to me. her house absolutely had electricity zapping and snapping within it.
content.summary: Electrical

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 4 weeks ago, my wife and i saw a solid white light floating across the skies of portland to the se, it made no noise we could detect. knowing regular air traffic used blinking lights and were normally accompanied by a noise, and being used to often times heavy regular air traffic, we found this particular object to be a bit odd. not being one to report strange things in the sky, we let it go.

however, on the night of september 15th, 2009, i walked into the front yard to smoke a cigarette, looked to the sw and saw what appeared to be a plane moving in a southerly direction, it had a white light in the front and two red lights trailing behind it. as i watched, i noticed the white light, which did not flash or blink, start to move further out in front of the two red lights. after a few more seconds, i realized they were two separate craft. the white light being the same white light as witnessed by my wife and myself about 4 weeks earlier, the red lights trailing it appeared to be a jet. i heard the sounds of jet engines in the direction of the red lights. i continued to watch for several seconds as the white light extended it's distance from the following jet until both lights disappeared behind the trees.

i don't usually involve myself, or my family, in these things, but my wife and i agreed this warranted some attention and we felt that mufon could, and would, handle this with discretion. i am willing to be interviewed by one of your representatives, and then proceed from there.
content.summary: Solid white light followed by jet (military?)

content.detailedDescription: I was on the dirt road located near the company called air products. i notice three lights in the sky at first i thought it was a plane. but i soon came to realize it was not. it was triangle shape with light on the points it was about a football field across from point to point. it moved at a slow speed very low in the sky. it made hardly if any noise.  as it few over me heading towards marion high school(westward)and over the mountain i lost sight of it . i was very curious. as i turned around that is when i noticed a second set of lights in the same shape coming toward me again. just as the 1st one flew the same path as the first one. i did think it could have been a milatry plane the stealth. but i did my reseach and found out the nearest stealth hanger was located in lllnois. i lived in this area my whole life and this was one of most unexplained thing i have ever seen. now i call airproducts area 52 because of all the strange happenings around that area... thank you for taking the time to read this finally i got to tell people who would listen
content.summary: 2 diffferent crafts  about 10 mins apart

content.detailedDescription: Nearby dog barking awoke me from deep sleep at approximately 4:15 am, sept 14, 2009.  looked out of ground floor bedroom window which faced south toward our dog kennel and saw quick strobe flashing white light.  appeared to be a couple of miles away.  1 1/2 to 3 miles away.  which would put it just over south delaware.  i am along the scioto river just west of delaware.  strobe light caught my attention.  there was an occasional red light and i just assumed it to be a small aircraft.  what seemed curious to me was the complete lack of sound and irratic movement unlike plane or helicopter.  object appeared to be 1500 - 2000 feet in the air and kept my attention because it bobbed up and down at that altitude staying in the same general area while always moving a bit but in a completely irratic manner including zigzagging, drifing up and down, to the left, to the right, sometimes having a red light, sometimes not.  sometimes bright, sometimes not.  much higher than a police helicopter looking for something or someone.  and again without any attendant sound.  it stayed in the same area for 90 minutes just while i happened to be awake watching it. i was feeling after a few minutes like i was watching something i had never seen before.  the sky is pretty dark here in the ostrander area between delaware and marysville and it is always interesting to look at the sky with or without the possibility of ufos.  this object was different in that there was no flight path from one location to another.  it was above the height of a typical helicopter but below the height of a commercial aircraft and had a very uncharacteristic bobbing and zigzagging drifting motion all in the same general area just not going anywhere.  it appeared to have a motion most similar to a fishing bobber in choppy waves only in slow motion.  i left in the van at 5:40-5:45 am to find what the object was hovering over and found it impossible to keep sight of object and drive at the same time.  it was just gone when i looked up after driving for a minute.  i did not see it exit. i contacted delaware airport and they said they were unaware of any aircraft in the area.  osu airport director said they had no transponder communication from any aircraft in that area at that time.  port columbus said that during that time there were only a couple of commercial flyovers.
content.summary: Silent hovering white strobed craft over south delaware area doing zigzag and circular patterns in sky for 90 minutes plus

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke at approximately 4:45 a.M. due to a burning pain in my right arm at the elbow nearest my body.  i felt an area of skin that seemed hot and burning.  i noticed some whitish substance on my arm that easily came off when i touched it. there was a single line about 1 inch long where the skin was broken in a very neat line like a razor blade would make.  this opening in the skin seemed very shallow and there was no bleeding.  around this line was an approximate 4 inch area of skin that was slghtly reddened with streaks of white tissue (no redness) that were raised from the normal level of skin almost like an allergic reaction.  between these white raised lines was reddened skin.  no pain or itching was present.  the only discomfort was in the area of the single line "break" in the skin which burned when i touched it.

i had a somewhat similar episode about 4 months ago on the outer part of my left thigh.  on this occasion, again in the early morning hours, i took a photo of the skin which had a large red spot in the middle of two small puncture marks that were all lined up in a straight line spaced about 3 or 4 inches apart but directly on line.  

a friend of mine who is a mufon member suggested that i report these events.
content.summary: Possible visitation or abduction

content.detailedDescription:
It was a beautiful clear blue sky day except for one puffy white cloud high in the sky.  i was laying in a private swimming pool on a raft looking up at the sky with a friend.  out of the center of the cloud drouped what looked at first to me like a parachutte with someone dangeling at the bottom.  in a short time we could see that it was not a person, but a metal colored cylinder.  it appeared to be attached close to one end of the chutte and dangled erratically.  at first i thought it was because it was too heavy for the chutte, because it was coming down fast and the parachutte seemed to be indented on either end as if was being pulled down too fast.  no plane was seen in the sky.

the parachutte however, did not sway or move in any way erratically, but came down swiftly and straight as if it was guided.  when it got approximately 100 to maybe 175 yards over the tree line. it vanished; but vanished instantly as if it hadn't been there.  then the cloud started to come down very quickly, as if it was coming right at us.  we started to get out of the pool and head in to the house, because we got the strange feeling the cloud was coming right at us.  then, just over our heads, the cloud dispursed.
content.summary: Parachutte shape with attached metal-colored cylinder at bottom of chutte

content.detailedDescription:
Last night between 8:00pm 9-14-2009 to about 2:00am 9-15-2009
i was haveing a regular dream and i keep hearing somebody talking
to me at the left side near the foot of my bed and i did not see a
entity but somebody was in my room last night asking me about something
i do not remember the entity was not invadeing my dream but talking
in it. asking or saying something. i dont remember the entity
was saying.
content.summary: Encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was working on an oil pipeline about a half hour drive in the woods from high level, alberta.  it was a bright, beautiful morning, and not a cloud in the sky.  i woke up late for work, so i jumped in a work truck and headed for my co worker who was a back hoe operator.  it was about 8:30 in the morning.  i was waiting for the back hoe driver to finish digging out a hole in the ground.  i sat in a truck in a huge clearing in the woods.  i was about 200 feet away from the back hoe.  the clearing was huge, and was made to build a particular part of the pipeline.  i seen something in the distance just over the treeline, around 9:10am.  it was a small white object.  moving very slowly, maybe 5 feet a second.  i thought it might be a plane or helicopter, but it was too close to the ground, so i kept watching.  it was coming closer and closer, and right in my direction.  i jumped out of the truck to see it more clearly.  i turned the truck off to see if it was making any noise, but it wasn't.  my heart started pounding as hard as ever, when i realized it wasn't a plane or helicopter.  soon, it was right above the clearing, and right above the back hoe and the operator inside it.  i waved and yelled as loud as i could to get his attention, since the back hoe was loud itself.  he noticed me for a second, so i pointed above him.  he looked up for a second, but didn't see anything, because of the cage that was built around the operators area for safety, and not seeing anything, he kept on working. then the slow moving cylinder was exactly right above me.  it was about 100 feet long, and 20 feet wide.  a perfect, pure white cylinder.  i couldn't see any seams, doors or windows.  it was travelling in a perfectly straight line.  it's like they wanted me to see them.  it kept on slowly creeping in the sky away from me to the opposite side of the clearing and i watched until it left my field of sight.  when i couldn't see it any more, i franticly ran to my co-worker i asked him if he noticed anything, but he didn't.  i told him what i seen, and he said, "it's probably jesus!" since he was a devout religious man. this stuck with me, because since then, i found out that it was written in the bible that moses followed a giant white cylinder,(but moses's cylinder was emitting flames) to where the 10 commandments were written and moses also followed one for 40 years through the desert.  i also found many videos on the internet of white cylinders, including a video from the russian army. they chased it with super sonic jets, and couldn't keep up with it.  in that video, they have a cgi comparison of a russian jet to the cylindrical object.  i think that it is about the same size and description of exactly what i saw.  i have been watching the skys ever since.
content.summary: Pure white cylinder, no seams or windows or doors.  about 150 feet above me

content.detailedDescription:
Coming to traffic light headed north on 169 in champlin, mn near daughters dance studio near elm creek parkway intersection.  look up to see what appears to be something on fire over head.  it is not that large and looks firey white or super pale silver with a solid core (metallic?) but a shadow framing it, sort of like a fried egg that is a bit off center.  
appears to hover a bit then moves slowly to the west?  then goes in a kind of short  zig zag then seems to take off or fade away.  thought it was a small plane on fire.  i told my daughter to try to follow it as i had to drive since the light changed but it just seemed to disappear.  have spent weeks trying to debunk it and looking on net for rational explanation but can't so decided to report it.  i've seen helicopters with search lights. planes on foggy nights etc, this wasn't that.  also rolled down window to hear any sound and it was silent other than traffic sounds.

it was exciting because it was different and not a plane etc, at first worrisome because at first glance i thought it was something on fire.  curious.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Thought it was a small plane on fire over a busy highway (169) at stop light. moved at angel then erradict then zipped off.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were vacationing in myrtle beach, sc.  i was sitting out on the balcony of our hotel, which was ocean front.  i was looking up at the sky and saw a flash of orange light.  it appeared instantly like a flash, then faded away.  i yelled at my boyfriend to come watch.  about 5 minutes later we both saw it, and this time it had a second light that flashed after the first one disappeared, but the second light was positioned farther down and to the right of the first light.  he said "oh it's just landing gear on a plane."  then i asked where the other lights were if it was just a plane...He agreed with me.  about 15 minutes later we saw it appear again, except it was in a different part of the sky.  the light was definately orange, and definately brighter and bigger than any of the stars.  we could also see one of the planets, and the orange light was bigger than the glowing planet.  this all happened between 10-10:30pm.  we went to bed.  my boyfriend woke up around 4am to go to the bathroom and he stepped outside and saw the light flash again....Which was 6 hours later, which threw the whole idea of "it might of been a plane" out the window.  he grabbed his dsl-r camera and set it on the tripod.  the flashing light came back and he was able to snap a couple of pictures before it went away.  the next couple of nights that we were there, i went outside to see if the light came back, but we never did see it again.
content.summary: Orange flashes in sky seen 3 times over a period of 7 hrs.
